title: The Next Best Thing
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
**[[[SCP-6682|0404SITE82AB1]]]**

##red|//We sit on the bed. It's a simple iron frame and a comfortable mattress.//
//The room is quiet.//
//They see nothing unusual on the CCTV.//
//I run my hand down his face.//
It's going to be okay, Blake. I'm here. I'm always here.
Nobody else is going to treat you like I do.
I'll always be here. Don't worry about //them.//
//He lays on my lap. A single tear runs down his face. He stares at my face.//##
You're such a piece of shit. I hate you.
##red|//His hand reaches and lays on my chest. I smile.//##
##red|I know. Jackass.##
##red|//I reach down and kiss his neck. He sighs.//##
##red|What would I do without you, Blake? I think I'd be dead.
//I can see he's torn. I know this is right. He thinks this is wrong.//##
I... I have shit to do. I can't be late again.
##red|Make an excuse. I don't get to see you enough. I'm stuck in here all the damn time.##
I know, but-
##red|No buts. If you really cared about me, you'd //stay.//##
##red|//He falls silent, clinging to my side.//##
##red|//We sit there for a moment.//##
##red|//I'm aware of what I'm saying, of course.//##
##red|//But it doesn't stop me. I know what I must do.//##
##red|//It's for their benefit, really. They just can't see it. They won't, or can't.//##
##red|//He'll make the right decision. I know he will.//##
I'll... I'll find an excuse.
##red|Good. I knew you'd make the right decision. I love you, Blake. You're... really good to me. And it's a better time than the dangerous SCPs, right?##
##red|//A short chuckle escapes him.//##
##red|//My hand reaches down to caress his side, and to search his pockets.//##
I s'pose.
##red|Besides. It's not like you have anyone else.##
##red|//He coughs. Looks left, then right, glancing at the control panel window.//##
Wait. What time is it? A-ah, fuck... I really, REALLY gotta go, just... I'm sorry, please don't-
##red|It's fine. Truly. Go ahead and do what you must do. I'll be stuck in here by myself. Thanks for that.##

...

##red|I'll see you later.##
I- I hav-
##red|I said, //I'll see you later.//##

...goodbye, Lilly.
